text: H þurh godes geuæ Ængelandes king grete ealle mine bissopes & ealle mine eorles & ealle mine scirreues & ealle mine ðeines Francissce & Ænglissce on ðan sciran þe Teobald Ærcebiscop & se hired æt Chrescircean on Cantorebiri habbeth lande mine frændlice.

And ic keðe eow þæt icc hæbbe geunne ðan ercebiscope & ta muneken æt Christescircean on Cantorebiri þæt hi ben æele þare lande wurþe þæ hi hadden on Eadwordes kinges dæge mines mæges & on Willelmes kinges dæge mines ealdealdfæder & on Hænres kinges dæge mines ealdefader.

And sake & socne on strande & on streame on wude & on felde tolnes & teames grihbreces & hamsocne forstealles & infangenes þeofes & flæmene fermðe ofer hagene men binn burgan & buten swa ful & swa forð swa mine agene wicnres hit secen scolde and ofer swa fæle peine swa Willelm king min ealdeealdefader & Henri king min ealdefader heom got ðet hadde.

And ic nelle þæt ani man æni þing þar on tyo buten hi hære wicnres þa hi hit bætecen willeð ne Frencisce ne Ængliss for þan þingan þæ icc hæbbe Christe þas gerihte forgeven minre saule to icere ælasten duesse ealswa Eadward king mi mæg & Willelm king min <ealdeealdefader> & Henri king min ealdefader ær hadden idon & ic nelle geþafien þæt æni man þis tobreke be mine fulle frendscipe.
